title: Deezer
description:
Deezer is a music streaming app that gives you access to over 73 million tracks worldwide and other audio content like podcasts. You even get curated recommendations and Deezer Originals exclusives.

Listen to music online, collect your favorites, create playlists, and share with friends, all for free.

You can also download all your favorite music and listen offline with Deezer Premium, Deezer Family and other plans.
